response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. It's not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your experience and productivity. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15,000. This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior quality. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this exclusive deal.", "product_price": 15000}
